TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IRouteConstraint

summary.span: 定义类必须实现才能检查某个 URL 参数值是否对约束有效的协定。

span.span: Defines the contract that a class must implement in order to check whether a URL parameter value is valid for a constraint.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当路由定义中包含 URL 参数的约束时，则必须为字符串或作为实现的对象代表约束接口。When you include a constraint for a URL parameter in a route definition, you must represent the constraint as either string or as an object that implements the interface. 如果约束是一个字符串，则将它视为正则表达式。If the constraint is a string, it is treated as a regular expression. 创建一个实现类时不能表示的验证逻辑轻松地为正则表达式。You create a class that implements when you cannot represent the validation logic easily as a regular expression. 添加验证逻辑中的方法。You add the validation logic in the method.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool Match (System.Web.HttpContextBase httpContext, System.Web.Routing.Route route, string parameterName, System.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary values, System.Web.Routing.RouteDirection routeDirection);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool Match(class System.Web.HttpContextBase httpContext, class System.Web.Routing.Route route, string parameterName, class System.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary values, valuetype System.Web.Routing.RouteDirection routeDirection) cil managed

public: bool Match(System::Web::HttpContextBase ^ httpContext, System::Web::Routing::Route ^ route, System::String ^ parameterName, System::Web::Routing::RouteValueDictionary ^ values, System::Web::Routing::RouteDirection routeDirection);
abstract member Match : System.Web.HttpContextBase * System.Web.Routing.Route * string * System.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary * System.Web.Routing.RouteDirection -> bool

param.name: httpContext
param.span: 一个对象，该对象封装有关 HTTP 请求的信息。

span.span: An object that encapsulates information about the HTTP request.
The object that this constraint belongs to.
The name of the parameter that is being checked.

param.name: values
param.span: 一个包含 URL 的参数的对象。

span.span: An object that contains the parameters for the URL.

param.name: routeDirection
param.span: 一个对象，指示在处理传入请求或生成 URL 时，是否正在执行约束检查。

span.span: An object that indicates whether the constraint check is being performed when an incoming request is being handled or when a URL is being generated.

summary.span: 确定 URL 参数是否包含此约束的有效值。

span.span: Determines whether the URL parameter contains a valid value for this constraint.

returns.span: 如果 URL 参数包含有效值，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the URL parameter contains a valid value; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您使用方法以添加该约束的验证逻辑。You use the method to add validation logic for the constraint. 处理传入请求时，构造一个 URL 时，将通过在路由框架调用此方法。This method is called by the routing framework when an incoming request is processed and when a URL is constructed. 可以通过检查来确定当前应用场景`routeDirection`参数。You can determine the current scenario by examining the `routeDirection` parameter. 处理请求时，路由框架会确定的模式和传入请求的值匹配的模式和路由的约束。When a request is processed, the routing framework determines whether the pattern and values of the incoming request match the pattern and constraints of the route. 当构造 URL 时，路由框架会确定何时是否提供的值调用方法与模式和约束的路由的匹配。When a URL is constructed, the routing framework determines whether the values supplied when the method is called match the pattern and constraints of the route.
